parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. The following properties can be added to change filter behavior (_gte,_lte,_lt,_gt). Examples: "createdAt_gte=2018-11-01T02:22:00.667" , "createdAt_lt=2018-11-01"

parameters.name: createdAt_gte
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Greater than or equal, >=

parameters.name: createdAt_gt
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Greater than, >

parameters.name: createdAt_lte
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Less than or equal, <=

parameters.name: createdAt_lt
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Less than, <

parameters.name: orderState
parameters.description: Filter orders by its state.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page of results to return.

parameters.name: maxResultsPerPage
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to return in one request, specified as an integer from 1 to 100.
